law.catch_line: Beginning and termination of extended benefit period.
law.text: Whenever an extended benefit period is to become effective in this state as a result of a state "on" indicator, or an extended benefit period is to be terminated in this state as a result of a state "off" indicator, the secretary shall make an appropriate public announcement.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(21). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 38.
